snippet.title: Gori: Cuddly Carnage - 2024 - [Official Release Trailer]
snippet.description:
Gori: Cuddly Carnage available on:
Steam, Epic, GOG, Switch, PlayStation 4/5 and Xbox One / SeriesX & S!

More information:
www.gori.wtf

Description:
Embark on a wild ride as Gori, an adorable but fierce cat on a hoverboard, as you battle the sinister Adorable Army of evil unicorns and twisted toys. Slice, dice, and revel in the glitter-filled chaos in this fast-paced, action-packed adventure that's as easy to play as it is exhilarating. With your trusty, wise-cracking hoverboard, F.R.A.N.K., and your gloomy AI companion, CH1-P, by your side, you'll shred through waves of enemies in a vibrant, comic book-inspired world where humanity has fallen, and it's up to you to save the day—one meow at danger!

Thank you so much for watching and supporting this small indiegame team of 5 people. We have worked so hard for 5 years to deliver our dream game to you. Please enjoy!
